body_content.explanation: (held or kept together) extremely firmly or closely:
examples: Screw the plug in with the wrench, snugly but not super-tight.
The top part can click forward on a super-tight joint.

body_content.explanation: fitting extremely closely to the body:
examples: She was wearing a super-tight black skirt and a crisp white shirt.

body_content.explanation: (of money, time, or space) extremely small in amount or size:
examples: Unless you are on a super-tight budget, I would recommend that you spend the money on a good pair of hiking boots.
There are options for maximizing your desk space if you have to work in a supertight cubicle.

body_content.explanation: limiting what you can do and what can happen in a very strict way:
examples: Security for the event will be super-tight due to the fact that some high-profile names will be in attendance.
According to a prison source, they want a supertight rein kept on his movements.
